realms.name: DRACONIS NEBULA
realms.description: A realm of primordial fire where stars are born from dragon's breath
realms.longDescription: In the time before stars, when the void was cold and empty, the Great Wyrm Ignis breathed fire across the darkness. Where his flames touched, galaxies ignited. Where his scales fell, worlds were born.

realms.name: SYLVAN VEIL
realms.description: Where stardust becomes flowers and magic flows like cosmic rivers
realms.longDescription: The Celestial Stag danced across the cosmos, and where her hooves touched the void, flowers of starlight bloomed. Her horn, dipped in the light of a thousand suns, weaves reality itself.

realms.name: ABYSSAL TRENCH
realms.description: In the darkness between stars, ancient leviathans swim through void-oceans
realms.longDescription: Sonar readings indicate consciousness at 3,847 meters. It dreams of surface ships, of stars reflected in water, of times before humans walked the earth. Each pulse of its ancient heart creates tidal forces across dimensions.

missions.name: Collect Ember Essence
missions.description: Gather 10 floating embers from the dragon's breath

missions.name: Awaken the Ancient
missions.description: Touch the crystal to increase awakening
